info: The standard markup language every web developer must know.
flex, grid, key-frames, margin, padding; These are some properties that I use to layout and design webpages.
Front-end JavaScript library that I use to create functional, reusable components. This website itself was created with React.
Have tried Tailwind on some projects in the past, and chose not to stylize without it. However, I can see it being useful for larger-scale projects.
CSS media queries and mindful of web accessibility techniques.
I know the basics of UNIX/Linus operating system commands. My current setup is a dual-boot of Windows OS and Ubuntu. I also tried coding on a Steam Deck (Arch Linux OS) for fun.
